content.question: What is the opportunity cost of keeping cash at home?

choices.label: The ability to make purchases quickly
The growth in the real value of the money that occurs during inflationary periods
The lost income from a zero-interest savings account at the bank
The lost income from not investing the money in an interest-bearing financial asset
The increased risk of losing the money in an economic downturn

content.answer: The lost income from not investing the money in an interest-bearing financial asset
